verses.roman:
bāra bāra niṣedhena, tabu kare āliṅgana
aṅge rasā lāge, duḥkha pāya sanātana

synonyms: bāra bāra—again and again; niṣedhena—forbids; tabu—still; kare āliṅgana—He embraces; aṅge—on the body; rasā lāge—oozing moisture touches; duḥkha—unhappiness; pāya—gets; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī.
translation: Although Sanātana Gosvāmī forbade Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to embrace him, the Lord did so. Thus His body was smeared with the moisture from Sanātana's body, and Sanātana became greatly distressed.
